greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists 2n-1 terms: The pairs of noncomposite numbers equidistant to n, with 0's inserted, as shown below in the example.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for n from 1 to 10 do for k from 1 to 2*n-1 do if(not k=n and (isnotcomp(k) and isnotcomp(2*n-k)))then print(k):else print(0):fi:od:od: # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Apr 18 2011
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := If[k != n && !CompositeQ[k] && !CompositeQ[2n - k], k, 0];
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 14 2009
